programme.title: Rachel Khoo: My Swedish Kitchen - EP 8

In every episode, she meets up with local food producers or a Swedish chef and visits stores and restaurants that focus on Swedish craftsmanship. Then it's back home to the kitchen, where she puts her twist on local recipes, preparing delicious, healthy food that's easy for anyone to cook at home.

programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: Emang Mukanya Boleh Selucu Ini Mba?
programme.desc: Diki and Fandi work together to thwart Fandi and Salma's wedding. Salma is taken away until she is eventually stolen. Adnan feels sorry for Salma's plight and helps her by lending her money. Will Salma and Adnan continue to meet?

programme.title: CINTA AMARA - EP 126
programme.desc: An engineered tragedy left 6-month-old Aziza separated from her mother. However, the baby was rescued by her grandfather and taken as far away as possible, so that her granddaughter would have no further contact with the Nirwan family, the kayakers who own a famous bakery company. Burhan, the baby's grandfather entrusted his granddaughter to his confidant, whose wife was pregnant.

programme.title: Hidup Lagi Capek Capeknya Justru Ketemu Mbanya
programme.desc: Arif, who sells sugar cane, is often helped by Nella so that he won't get evicted. Nella, who works as a civil service police officer, seems to have gradually fallen for the sugar cane seller.

programme.title: ANAK BAND - EP 114
programme.desc: Cahaya, who was trading with his vegetable cart, felt like he got a durian collapse when suddenly Gilang, the vocalist of The Junas, Cahaya's favorite band, ran up to Cahaya asking for help so that Cahaya helped him avoid the pursuit of his fans. Light, who was kind and always optimistic, happily helped Gilang hide. Once safe, Gilang came out of hiding and thanked Light. Light was very happy because it turned out that Gilang was very friendly.

programme.title: Aku Tuh Gak Bisa Di Eskrimin
programme.desc: Ney suddenly hugged Sisi, who was selling ice cream. Ney thought Sisi was her deceased mother. Bima looked for Ney, who was not at school, and found her with Sisi. Bima did not expect to see his late wife in Sisi.

programme.title: Cantik Cantik Serigala

Raffi then turned the key, the cage door opened, and the wolf inside immediately jumped out, shocking Raffi and causing him to fall backwards. Raffi ran, falling and getting up, until he fell into a ravine after his foot got caught on a tree root. Suddenly, the object vanished as if it had entered Raffi's body.

programme.title: Cinta Karena Cinta - EP 114
programme.desc: 15 years ago, Jenar found himself in a tragic event that claimed the lives of his family. Mila, who is Jenar's older sister, is still alive after Ayu's adoption. Jenar's life changes after meeting Mirza, a man who is attracted to her.

programme.title: Cintaku Padamu Tak Akan Kububur Dalam Dalam

programme.title: Motif Sosial? - EP 4

programme.title: Sorok - Sorok - EP 11
programme.desc: Kisah mengenai seorang jejaka bernama Rudi, yang merupakan seorang 'player' dan sering kali bertukar teman wanita. Dia kemudian telah jatuh cinta dengan seorang gadis yang diidamkan.

programme.title: Sketso - EP 4

Full of mischief, he also has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: La Famille Blaireau-Renard - EP 15
programme.desc: Edmond is the father of three little badger cubs; all living happily in their sett. One day, he falls in love with Marguerite, a fox! Everything changes when Marguerite and her daughter move into the den; both families now have to find a way to live together in harmony!

programme.title: La Cabane A Histoires - EP 14
programme.desc: Four best friends have a secret: after school, they climb up to their hidden tree house. It contains a priceless treasure: books! Each day, the children tell one another stories, travelling to exciting fairy-tale worlds.

programme.title: Sam & Julia - EP 71
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Droners - EP 24
programme.desc: 95% of the planet Terraqua is covered by its oceans. Corto, Arthus, Enki and Mouse make up the Tikis, a team from the idyllic archipelago of Nui. They have the firm intention of winning the ''Whale Cup'', the biggest drone race ever.

programme.title: Les Super-Pouvoirs Du Vivant - EP 1
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is brimming with creatures that have extraordinary powers. To reveal the incredible inventiveness of nature and the importance of protecting it, each episode takes us on a fascinating journey rich in poetry and humour.

programme.title: Les Super-Pouvoirs Du Vivant - EP 2
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is brimming with creatures that have extraordinary powers. To reveal the incredible inventiveness of nature and the importance of protecting it, each episode takes us on a fascinating journey rich in poetry and humour.

programme.title: Le Refuge D'audrey - EP 19
programme.desc: What do the hairy-nosed wombat, the k?k?p? and the saiga antelope have in common? They are all amongst the rarest animals on Earth. Audrey, age 7, shares her everyday life with them at a wildlife shelter that works to protect species threatened with extinction.

programme.title: Comme Des Tetes Pas De Poule - EP 17
programme.desc: Felix loses his partner in the budding genius competition and Cindy is put forward as a replacement. Flavie misses school and ignores her homework to see her idol.

programme.title: Tamia - EP 15
programme.desc: Tamia is a courageous young girl who does nothing without careful thought. She wants to be a mediator between parents and their children, a voice for those without one. Helped by friends Audrey, Sara, Yao and Cheick, she enjoys plenty of adventures, taking her young audience on a veritable journey.

programme.title: Mission Info - EP 26
programme.desc: News programme aimed at 7 to 11-year-olds! Each episode, devised for children and their parents, provides insight accessible to younger ones, combined with explanations, immersive reports and expert interviews. An educational quiz also gives children the chance to test their knowledge in a fun way.

programme.title: 36.9° - EP 9
programme.desc: The health magazine from RTS.

programme.title: Objectif Monde L'hebdo - EP 8
programme.desc: Barely fifteen years ago, Portugal was on the verge of bankruptcy. Today, the country is back on the path to growth. Once, the Portuguese emigrated to find work in Europe; now, foreigners, including Americans, are taking refuge in Lisbon. What are the consequences for the local population?

programme.title: Ethique Helvetique - EP 10
programme.desc: Swiss neutrality is a topic that sparks debate. With every international crisis, the question arises again: should we take a stand or remain neutral? The issue has resurfaced especially since Switzerland decided to follow European sanctions against Russia. Where does this tradition of neutrality come from?

programme.title: Le Magazine De La Riviera - EP 62
programme.desc: The magazine programme all about the art of living in Monaco, Provence and on the Cote d'Azur.

programme.title: Suisse En Scene
programme.desc: Interview with a key figure from the Swiss cultural scene. An opportunity to look back at their life and career, and the foundations that underpin their work.

programme.title: Rassemblance - EP 14
programme.desc: He didn't speak a word of French when he arrived in Quebec to work as a welder. Today, Cesar Pilli has a job in human resources and a YouTube channel dedicated to Quebecois culture.

programme.title: Le Match Dans Le Match - EP 59
programme.desc: Multiple French champion, world champion in the small pool and European champion in small and large pools, Beryl Gastaldello looks back at her achievements and her career.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Papilles - EP 14
programme.desc: 'Put a piece of the mountains on your plate!'' This is the motto of three-star chef and Meilleur Ouvrier de France, Emmanuel Renaut, who works at the Flocons de Sel hotel and restaurant. Welcome to Megeve, where you can enjoy mountain cuisine and discover a rich land!

programme.title: Hep Taxi ! - EP 3
programme.desc: In town or in the countryside, day or night, Jerome Colin, the presenter-taxi driver leads his prestigious customer on a four-wheel journey conducive to secrets.

programme.title: Quel Avenir Pour Nos Abeilles ?
programme.desc: Apiculture is on the rise in Swiss towns, to the point where the many honeybees are vying with rare wild species and butterflies for food: a problematic situation for the biodiversity. Should we regulate production and make it more respectful of nature?

programme.title: Tendance XXI - EP 22
programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 21
programme.desc: Passionate about French chic, ambassadress Katherina Marx surrounds herself with major figures from the worlds of fashion, design, gastronomy, and fine living. Each episode features an iconic guest and a series of special reports, allowing viewers to discover or rediscover France, its young designers, and its chic and trendy hang-outs.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Refuges De Montagne - Hiver - EP 2
programme.desc: At the Tierbergli mountain hut, the season can finally begin. But things are very quiet at the Zapport; military exercises mean that clients are unable to take the shortest route to reach the refuge in Grialetsch. Tanja and Werner decide to take on extra staff.

programme.title: Carbone - EP 2
programme.desc: There is every chance that the fires devastating our forests each summer will become increasingly frequent. It's a race against time to prepare local communities so they're ready to confront the infernos of the future.

programme.title: Le Journal International
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Famille Je Vous Aime - EP 1
programme.desc: In both music and comedy, family has always inspired artists. Around Michel Drucker, each guest comes with a close family member to talk about that special bond they share with their family. Gad Elmaleh, godfather of this first show, is joined by his two parents, Regine and David.

programme.title: Les Mysteres De La Duchesse
programme.desc: Cyril is found murdered in his manor house. A year earlier, he had married the Duchess of Cremier, thirty years his senior. Maud Artuis investigates, with the unexpected help of a private detective employed by the duchess's daughter. What secrets has the family been hiding?

programme.title: Le Dessous Des Cartes - EP 6
programme.desc: International relations analysed using geography maps, which are vital to understanding the world in which we live and the challenges it presents.

programme.title: Avant L'effondrement
programme.desc: Tristan, campaign director for a parliamentary election candidate, panics when he discovers a positive pregnancy test in his post. Potentially suffering from a fatal genetic disease, he investigates to discover if this is a political trick or a genuine test. Even if it means abandoning his professional and love life.

programme.title: Treizor
programme.desc: A father and his son have an appointment with a psychiatrist to try to understand the young man's OCD behaviour and rituals that all revolve around the number 13.

programme.title: Papillon
programme.desc: A man swims in the sea. As he advances, memories come flooding back. From early childhood to his adult life, all his memories are connected to water. Some are happy, others glorious or even traumatic...

programme.title: Movie - LKG
programme.desc: LKG, a councillor of a small town, aspires to become the chief minister of the state. He enlists the help of the corporates to impress the public, but faces threat from another politician.

programme.title: Movie - Alli Thantha Vaanam
programme.desc: Satyan is a no-good son of a rich businessman. The latter lays down a challenge to his son to spend three months in Chennai on his own. Success means happiness for the father and the reins of their company for the son.

programme.title: Movie - Galatta Ganapathy
programme.desc: A man gets married to a woman but when he brings her home, his mother demands dowry from her. Things take a turn when he learns that she is a sub-inspector.

programme.title: Movie - Nyayam
programme.desc: Nyayam is a movie directed by R Krishnamurthy featuring Prabhu, Nalini, Thengai Srinivasan, M.N.Nambiar and M.R.R.Raghu, with music by Ilaiyaraaja.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Bramman
programme.desc: Siva, a movie buff, owns a cinema theatre, which runs into financial trouble. However, his life changes for the better when he meets his childhood friend who is now a famous movie director.

programme.title: Movie - Koodi Vazhndal Kodi Nanmai
programme.desc: Thangarasu and his wife Meenakshi take care of his brothers Krishna and Sivaraman. However, when the brothers get married, conflicts grow amongst the family members.

programme.title: Movie - Narasimha
programme.desc: An evil man terrorises the nation when he plans to kidnap the chiefs of the defence services and execute them publicly. An honest police officer tries to foil the plans and save his countrymen.

programme.title: Movie - Vathiyaar
programme.desc: Annadurai, an ordinary school teacher, turns into a Good Samaritan and runs an orphanage after a tragic incident. However, his actions are closely watched by ACP Easwara Pandian and his team.

programme.title: Movie - Komban
programme.desc: Komban, who protects his locality from bad people, always ends up resorting to violence. He decides to stop being violent after his marriage, but his past records never let him be at ease.

programme.title: Movie - Kaadhal Konden
programme.desc: A young orphan who is an introvert but a genius at the same time is raised by a church priest. He is sent to college where he turns out to be a misfit socially. Although he is shunned by the majority of students, one girl starts to warm up to him.

programme.title: Movie - Killadi Mappillai
programme.desc: Rajaram rejects the girl chosen by his father since he loves Shanthi. However, he must first take up the herculean task of impressing Shanthi's parents so that they will permit him to marry her.

programme.title: Movie - Seetha
programme.desc: Seetha is a 1990 Tamil-language thriller film directed by S. A. Chandrasekhar.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Moive - Agent Kannayiram
programme.desc: When a rookie yet brilliant detective solving small-time crimes yearns for complicated cases, he chances upon a heart-wrenching case of a grieving father. But as he starts joining the dots, he unravels something more sinister.

programme.title: Movie - Biriyani
programme.desc: Sugan and Parasuram leave Varadharajan's party drunk in search of a place to have biryani. They get into some serious trouble when they find his dead body in the trunk of their car.

programme.title: Movie - Citizen
programme.desc: Abdulla, a mechanic, kidnaps three prominent government officials. Sarojini is a CBI officer who investigates this matter and tries to piece together the clues left behind by the kidnapper.

programme.title: Movie - Sandai
programme.desc: Thangalakshmi, a wealthy woman, arranges for her daughter Abhi to get married to an NRI in her native village. However, a twist of events leads to Abhi getting married to her bodyguard, Kathiresan.

programme.title: Movie - Natpe Thunai
programme.desc: Prabhakaran, a former hockey player, helps a local team save their ground by training them to win a match against the Pondicherry team. However, a corrupt politician has his eyes set on the ground.

programme.title: Hologic WTA Tour 2025
programme.desc: The WTA Jiangxi Open is a professional women's tennis tournament, classified as a WTA 250 event, held annually in China. Played on outdoor hard courts, it features 32 singles players competing for WTA points and prize money. The tournament was founded in 2014.

programme.title: World Matchplay Darts 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 Betfred World Matchplay will take place at the Winter Gardens, Blackpool. The iconic summer tournament will see 32 of the world's top stars battling it out across 9 days for the Phil Taylor Trophy and £800,000 in prize money.

programme.title: Mass Participation 2025
programme.desc: Mass participation sports events are commonly associated with large participation numbers, usually in the tens of thousands. programme.title: FANZONE - FRI 31 OCT (Live)
programme.desc: This is the show that puts international fans at the heart of the Premier League conversation. We connect with fans from around the world as they share their views on their teams and favourite players.

programme.title: PREVIEW - FRI 31 OCT
programme.desc: We preview a huge London derby between Spurs and Chelsea, Andoni Iraola speaks to us ahead of Bournemouth's trip to Manchester City, and we focus on Liverpool v Aston Villa.

programme.title: WELCOME TO THE WEEKEND - FRI 31 OCT
programme.desc: Spurs midfielders Pape Sarr and Wilson Odobert get spooked in a Halloween themed challenge, while a magician touring Premier League grounds joins Ayo live from Tottenham Hotspur Stadium as the ground prepares to host Chelsea

programme.title: TEAM TALKS - FRI 31 OCT (Live)
programme.desc: Punditry, pressers and predictions ahead of the PL weekend. Our studio team tackle all the major talking points and we hear from the headline acts as the players and the managers have their say ahead of the action.

programme.title: FANTASY SHOW - FRI 31 OCT
programme.desc: Haaland or Salah? Saka or Palmer? Isak or Cunha? Picking your Fantasy team is never easy, but the Fantasy Show is on hand to help FPL Managers with those big decisions.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 12
programme.desc: Having originally joined Arsenal as a teenager in 2015, Donyell Malen's currently becoming a key figure in Unai Emery's Aston Villa side a decade later. Malen talks us through his journey that started in the Ajax academy, culminating in an Eredivisie title with PSV in 2018, following his brief stay in North London. He reflects on his time in the Bundesliga with Borussia Dortmund and making the 2024 Champions League final before his transfer to Aston Villa last January.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 22
programme.desc: We tell the story of a commanding centre-back whose leadership and consistency made him a standout figure in both the Premier League and international football. From his early career in Portugal to his influential spell at Southampton, PL Stories explores how Fonte became a rock in the heart of defence during the club's rise in the top-flight.

programme.title: 1-to-11 2025/26 - EP 3
programme.desc: Nicknamed ‘Der Hammer’ for his thunderous left foot, Thomas Hitzlsperger sits down to reveal his ultimate 1-to-11. Reflecting on his Premier League journey with Aston Villa, West Ham, and Everton, he shares stories of the teammates who stood out most along the way. It’s a team that blends flair, toughness, and match-winning ability.

programme.title: PL Rewind 2025/26 - EP 6
programme.desc: With 5 Premier League titles and 187 goals, Andrew Cole is one of English football’s true icons. He recounts his greatest strikes, most memorable partnerships, and relives all the final day drama from his Manchester United years.

programme.title: PL Stories 2025/26 - EP 22
programme.desc: We tell the story of a commanding centre-back whose leadership and consistency made him a standout figure in both the Premier League and international football. From his early career in Portugal to his influential spell at Southampton, PL Stories explores how Fonte became a rock in the heart of defence during the club’s rise in the top-flight.

programme.title: The Big Interview 2025/26 - EP 12
programme.desc: Having originally joined Arsenal as a teenager in 2015, Donyell Malen’s currently becoming a key figure in Unai Emery’s Aston Villa side a decade later. Malen talks us through his journey that started in the Ajax academy, culminating in an Eredivisie title with PSV in 2018, following his brief stay in North London. He reflects on his time in the Bundesliga with Borussia Dortmund and making the 2024 Champions League final before his transfer to Aston Villa last January.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Darren Daniel vs. Dricus Du Plessis
programme.desc: Check out exciting action from MMA organizations around the world. This episode features coverage of mixed martial arts in South Africa including two Middleweights Darren "Double D" Daniel and Dricus "Stillknocks" Du Plessis who will meet in the hex for middleweight supremacy. Bonus coverage includes Alain Ilunga vs. Sydney Mokgolo and Themba Gorimbo vs. Alex Cheboub.

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Chad Dawson vs. Antonio Tarver II
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features Light Heavyweight 'Bad' Chad Dawson (27-0, 17 KOs) vs. Antonio 'Magic Man' Tarver (27-5, 19 KOs). Held at the Hard Rock Hotel and Casino, Las Vegas, Nevada, USA on May 9, 2009, it's Dawson's first defense of the IBF Light Heavyweight and IBO Light Heavyweight titles.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Floyd Mayweather vs. Felipe Garcia
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS presents another exciting Greatest Classics episode, bringing you more action featuring the greatest fighters in boxing history. One of the all-time greats is featured just one year from making his pro debut, as a 10-0 "Pretty Boy"Floyd Mayweather - long before he became "Money" - has a tough test against Felipe Garcia of Mexico.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather, Jr. vs. Victor Ortiz
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a WBC welterweight title bout between Floyd Mayweather, Jr. and Victor Ortiz, which generated $78 million in pay-per-view revenue from 1.25 million buys. Also on the card, action from super welterweight champ James Kirkland and Alfredo Angulo.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 1 featuring Harumafuji, Okinoumi, Myogiryu and Goeido from the Aki basho, 2015.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode, we see the best of the Judo Grand Slam from Paris as some of the 2016 Olympics' finest athletes battle for their shot at glory.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Paul Williams vs. Sergio Martinez
programme.desc: Wide World Of Fights includes all styles of fighting from around the world in one show! This episode features the first encounter between Paul Williams and Sergio Martinez, one that ends in a controversial majority decision, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: MEGA Fights Timothy Bradley vs. Devon Alexander
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features a battle of unbeaten junior welterweights to unify the WBC and WBO world titles as Timothy Bradley, aka 'Desert Storm', (26-0, 11 KOs) faces Devon Alexander 'The Great' (21-1, 13 KOs). This fight took place at the Silverdome in Pontiac, Michigan, USA on January 29, 2011.

programme.title: BWF Martial Arts
programme.desc: This episode features highlights from the Women's Weapons Championship as well as Boys Forms, Synchronized Team Weapons and a World Record Break.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best of the Judo Grand Prix from Antalya, speak with Lukas Krpalek about his move to +100 kg weight class, and get a demonstration on how to preform the popular ride and roll counter attack.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Adrien Broner vs. Jason Litzau
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is then-undefeated Adrien Broner taking on Jason Litzau in a fight that ends with a first-round TKO. Also on the card, action from light welterweight champ Amir Khan.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 1 featuring Goeido, Shodai, Takayasu and Ichinojo from the Haru basho, 2018.

programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Episode 6: Bandung, Indonesia - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Pencak Silat and the Martial Art of Hands, Feet, Throws and Weapons featuring Masters Rita Suwanda and Dadang Gunawan.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Manon Fiorot vs. Mellony Guegjes
programme.desc: This episode features coverage of the TF2 women's flyweight finale between Manon Fiorot and Mellony Guegjes. Bonus coverage includes Adrian Sanchez vs. Serge Kasanda.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Timothy Bradley vs. Devon Alexander
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features a battle of unbeaten junior welterweights to unify the WBC and WBO world titles as Timothy Bradley, aka 'Desert Storm', (26-0, 11 KOs) faces Devon Alexander 'The Great' (21-1, 13 KOs). This fight took place at the Silverdome in Pontiac, Michigan, USA on January 29, 2011.

programme.title: BWF Martial Arts
programme.desc: This episode features highlights from the Women's Weapons Championship as well as Boys Forms, Synchronized Team Weapons and a World Record Break.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best of the Judo Grand Prix from Antalya, speak with Lukas Krpalek about his move to +100 kg weight class, and get a demonstration on how to preform the popular ride and roll counter attack.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Adrien Broner vs. Jason Litzau
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is then-undefeated Adrien Broner taking on Jason Litzau in a fight that ends with a first-round TKO. Also on the card, action from light welterweight champ Amir Khan.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 1 featuring Goeido, Shodai, Takayasu and Ichinojo from the Haru basho, 2018.

programme.desc: Duggee is encouraging the Squirrels to come outside by gesturing through the window. They don't understand what he's doing and think it's funny. When he comes inside, he explains that he was miming.

programme.title: Dog Squad (S3) - EP 3
programme.desc: Dan and Jamie ride the chair lift to the top of the mountain to warn some hikers that the resort is closing because of a storm. Can they get everyone off the mountain safely in time?

Chilli tries to convince Bluey that perfection isn't easy, or absolutely necessary.

programme.desc: At Squirrel Club, Duggee forgets how to woof, Duggly comes to visit, Roly celebrates Potato Time, and Billy teaches everyone the Bugatron dance!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 - EP 601

programme.desc: The crew competes for Burn's affection after she wins a vacation; Turbo and Deuce try to beat Hardcase and make the junior racing league fun again.

programme.title: Where's Wally? S1 - EP 12
programme.desc: The Wanderers head to Venice to get a new cookie jar from Venice. Odlulu aims to become belle of the ball at the Venice Carnival but when she gets hold of the Crystal Glass Key, she turns the canals of Venice to glass. The Wanderers must get the key back and restore the city to normal.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2 - EP 38
programme.desc: When Fuse invites his friends to come for a playdate all they want to do is play his new computer game. But then suddenly the computer goes off. He soon discovers there's a power cut affecting the whole of Brickabuild. But who switched off the power? And why? Desperate to carry on with the game, Noddy decides to investigate: how can they play Fuse's new game?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2 - EP 39
programme.desc: Queen Sparklewings asks the Pirate Captain to do the first dance with her at the Queen's Dance. But when it's time to practise, the Captain can't come: someone's stolen their treasure! Noddy decides to help find the treasure so the Captain will still be able to dance. He needs to investigate: Who stole the Pirates' treasure?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 - EP 51
programme.desc: Roary helps PC Pete keep the track safe on a snowy day.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 - EP 52
programme.desc: Breeze is visiting the track. The beach is boring in the winter as nobody comes to visit. She tries her best to help everyone get ready for the winter festival but doesn't seem to be good at anything…

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 25
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Flamingo stood on both legs. One morning, Flamingo and her flock landed at the Water Hole when all the crabs were busy performing their underwater dance. Needless to say, all these legs where in their way! Tortoise came up with the plan that if all Crabs each nipped a flamingo leg, there will be room to share the waterhole. So from then on, Flamingo stood on one legs and Crabs were able to perform their dance in the watering hole

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 26
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Woodpecker didn't peck. All the birds had their very own sound, but Woodpecker didn't make a sound at all.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: When 6 adorable hamster kitties get loose in the dollhouse, Gabby, Pandy and Baby Box head out to look for them. Along the way, Baby Box learns a lot about hamster kitties, which convinces Mama Box to let them live in the Craft Room.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a school notebook and lunch box, it's Kitty School Day in the dollhouse! Gabby and Pandy head to different classes held by the Gabby Cats to learn and live a day in the life of a student.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 13
programme.desc: When a mysterious creature keeps stealing people’s prized possessions, the crew discovers the Nine-Tailed Fox, a trickster rooted in Chinese lore. Unbeknownst to Yi, she is taken on a realm-bending journey by NTF so that the Fox might pry away Yi’s prized violin. The crew eventually comes back together and realizes that NTF takes items people think they need to be happy. Yi was able to hold onto her violin because it truly does make her happy and is a fundamental part of who she is.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 14
programme.desc: While Everest is going through some typical teenager growing pains (not wanting to brush his teeth or tidy his room…), a welcome distraction comes in the form of LiLi, an adorable nine-year-old who’s positively obsessed with Yi, Everest, and the crew’s pursuits. When Everest doesn’t return from a sweets-filled outing with LiLi, the crew discovers LiLi’s intentions might not have been so pure.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 - EP 13
programme.desc: Grayson wrangles Spirit "fair and square" and sends him to auction in another town --and there is nothing Lucky can do to stop him!

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 - EP 14
programme.desc: Spirit and Lucky desperately try to find a way back to one another.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! S1 - EP 13
programme.desc: Satin and Chenille put on a fashion show to impress the trendsetter of Troll VillagePoppy and Branch start a massive villagewide pillow battle to determine who gets the pillow of destiny.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! S1 - EP 14
programme.desc: When there is an imposter in Troll Village, Branch and Poppy embark on a man-hunt as to try to keep the Trolls from realizing that anything is off/Poppy discovers that Archer Pastry belongs to a group of evil creatures called the Party Crashers

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 25
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a recipe for dandelion soup and a soup bowl, she discovers Kitty Fairy is sick! With the help of all the Gabby Cats, they water the Singing Flowers, help the Rainbow Kitty Bushes regain their color, and sing some fussy Itty Bitty Blossoms a lullaby. For our Gabby Cat of the Day segment, Kitty Fairy sings a song!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 1

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: The dollhouse delivery is a cat-in-the-box that startles Gabby, giving her the hiccups. Dr. Pandy and the Gabby Cats try several cures, but it isn't until CatRat scares the hiccups out of Gabby that they go away!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 3

But when Halloween arrives, those innocent-looking carved pumpkins reveal themselves for what they really are mutant aliens.

programme.desc: Clockwork Mouse leaves Carlton in charge of getting everything ready for the Builders' Parade. Carlton gratefully accepts Noddy's offer of help but doesn't want the Naughticorns helping too! But when Carlton goes to the Brickabuild Store for supplies, he's horrified to discover the store is empty. How will they get the parade ready now? And will Clockwork Mouse ever trust Carlton again? Noddy sets out to investigate: Who took all the stuff from the Brickabuild Store?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2 - EP 41
programme.desc: It's time for the Toyland football match but the game can't go ahead until Noddy finds the missing players. Jackal and Spider stole the feathers from Ostrich's neck and legs until she looked like a very big plucked chicken! The next day Ostrich was mortified and stuck her head in the ground so that Lion couldn't see her.

Saddled with these mind-blowing revelations, the crew must find a way to escape and stop Mr. Lung from using creature magic for evil."

programme.desc: The survivalists finally begin to cash in on food as game proves to be plentiful. This prosperity is short-lived, however, as dark clouds loom in the distance.

programme.title: The Food That Built The World (S5) - EP 2

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3) - EP 20
programme.desc: Remarkable feats of engineering from our ancient past span the globe. Some are amazing in size. Others in sophistication. Some are so strange they border on inexplicable.

programme.title: Hazardous History With Henry Winkler (S1) - EP 4
programme.desc: Ever taken medical advice from a cigarette commercial? There was a time when any and all 'cures' could be sold to the public indiscriminately.

programme.title: The UnBelievable With Dan Aykroyd (S1) - EP 6
programme.desc: Picture this: a full-body gas mask for babies. How about Smell-o-Vision? Or a robot powered by eating slugs? These are all real inventions, and we've got them covered.

programme.title: The Making Of: Crossroads, Maldives - EP 1
programme.desc: The pieces of the island building chess board are moved into position as we meet the team responsible for making the Crossroads dream a reality.

programme.title: The Making Of: Crossroads, Maldives - EP 2
programme.desc: When preparing a shopping list for a world-class resort, a semi submersible -submarine might not be the first thing that springs to mind. But on Crossroads, that's exactly what's on the agenda.

programme.title: Alone (S10) - EP 9
programme.desc: With the snow comes a rush of emotion and the participants are tested in their resolve to keep working towards the $500,000 prize.

programme.title: History's Greatest Escapes With Morgan Freeman (S2) - EP 10
programme.desc: During World War II, the Nazis created specialised Death Camps for killing prisoners. At Sobibor, a group of Jews were forced to keep the camp operational, engineered a daring escape that saved many lives.

programme.title: Women On Death Row - EP 1
programme.desc: Shawna Forde was convicted for a 2009 crime that resulted in the violent murders of Raul Flores and his 9-year-old daughter Brisenia. She was sentenced to death.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: Murder In The Bayou - EP 4
programme.desc: When a young mother, Selonia Reed, 26, is found brutally murdered in her car, detectives turn over every rock in small-town Hammond, Louisiana, in search of her killer.

programme.title: Butchers Of The Bayou - EP 3
programme.desc: After Derrick Todd Lee was arrested, police were able to connect him to other cold cases. Baton Rouge had approximately 60 unsolved cases of missing or murdered women from the previous 10 years.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: Dead West - EP 6
programme.desc: In 1987 Carol Murphy, 28, is found by hikers slain in a wooded area of Lefthand Canyon, CO. Police uncover a turbulent love life and plenty of suspects in this Western enclave.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: Dead West - EP 4
programme.desc: When a mystery woman's burning body is found in an oil field in 2006, the rural community of Kilgore and a determined Texas lawman show why you don't mess with the Lone Star State.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2) - EP 7
programme.desc: The family of Miya Marcano share the agonising details of what happened around the beautiful 19-year-old's disappearance.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S2) - EP 6
programme.desc: In Virginia Beach, one man is struggling to feed his kids while another is surprised to find he owes child support. A woman is indignant to learn she's been arrested for getting drunk in a bar.

programme.desc: Historical Bucks County, is alarmed when several young men vanish one after the other within a week. Detectives unearth a ruthless murder spree in this seemingly picture-perfect farming community.

programme.desc: A gas station worker faces down the barrel of a gun and is ordered to empty her registers; a man running an errand goes on a high speed chase to elude carjackers.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S1) - EP 2

programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments: a violent felon attacks a prosecutor in court; a judge has heard enough from a Sovereign Citizen; a murdered NBA star's mother blows up in court; and more.

programme.title: The European debrief
programme.desc: Live headlines,breaking news, analysis and interviews from Europe's News Centre.

programme.title: The European debrief
programme.desc: Live headlines,breaking news, analysis and interviews from Europe's News Centre.

programme.title: Halftime Report - EP 1
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day

programme.title: Halftime Report - EP 2
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day

programme.title: The Exchange - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBC’s ‘The Exchange’ is the newsroom-based program for today’s investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: The Exchange - EP 2
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Power Lunch - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Power Lunch - EP 2
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Closing Bell - EP 1
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Closing Bell - EP 2
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime - EP 1
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime - EP 2
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Fast Money - EP 1
programme.desc: "Fast Money" is America’s post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, "Fast Money" breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.

programme.title: Fast Money - EP 2
programme.desc: "Fast Money" is America’s post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, "Fast Money" breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.

programme.title: CNBC Explains
programme.desc: ‘CNBC Explains’ is a dynamic explainer series that dives deep into the forces shaping our world. Each episode unpacks complex business and economic topics, breaking them down into clear, compelling narratives. With expert insights, data-driven visuals and a global perspective, this series helps viewers understand not just what is happening, but why it matters.

programme.title: Who Owns
programme.desc: Is that space public or private? Who Owns…? looks into privately-owned "public" areas and the implications for the people who use them.

programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime rpt - EP 44

programme.title: Fast Money (rpt) - EP 93

programme.title: The Swift Effect
programme.desc: Celebrating the economic impact Taylor Swift's brand has on and off-stage; exploring how she has redefined business landscapes in music, fashion, sports, education and philanthropy, generating billions of dollars and influencing global markets.

programme.title: CNBC Sports - WDSC World Downhill Skateboarding Championship

programme.title: Late Night with Seth Meyers
programme.desc: Emmy Award-nominated "Late Night with Seth Meyers," hosted by award-winning writer and performer Seth Meyers, is home to incisive humor, topical jokes and A-list celebrity guests. The series’ signature "A Closer Look" segment has garnered millions of views and is widely lauded for its tightly written and thoughtful approach to analyzing and satirizing news of the day.

programme.title: Late Night with Seth Meyers

programme.title: The CNBC Conversation
programme.desc: A show that lets the person talk for themselves and gives audiences a glimpse at the personality behind the public persona. Heads of State, titans of business and celebrated stars sit down for the CNBC Conversation.

programme.title: CNBC Sport: On The Record
programme.desc: CNBC Sport: On The Record explores the convergence of sports, business, and investing. Each week, we sit down with the biggest names in sports - from league commissioners, team owners, influential media executives and top athletes - to give you an insider's perspective on the strategies, deals, and stories shaping sports and business.

programme.desc: Larry Madowo travels across Nigeria to meet two remarkable storytellers preserving the nation's heritage. In Enugu, heritage specialist Iheanyi Igboko safeguards Igbo traditions through the Centre for Memories, while in Lagos, historian Oludamola Adebowale uses digital innovation to archive and celebrate Nigeria's cultural past. Together, they reveal how history, language, and art continue to shape identity and inspire the next generation.

programme.title: Inside Africa
programme.desc: Rising dramatically from the plains of southern Malawi, Mount Mulanje is a soaring granite massif known as the "Island in the Sky." It is home to a fragile and unique ecosystem and at its heart stands the Mulanje cedar (Widdringtonia whytei), a tree so rare it's found nowhere else on Earth. Once covering vast slopes of the mountain, the cedar is now critically endangered.

Big Story aims to present the contemporary world and China’s global perspectives on the contemporary world to an international audience.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Inheritors
programme.desc: Inheritors is a multi-media product from CGTN that shines a light on China’s rich Intangible Cultural Heritage. Each 30-minute TV edition is hosted by a long-term expatriate in China who has a unique understanding of the country’s culture. He or she will introduce viewers to people who are dedicating their lives to its protection, inheritance, innovation, development and promotion.

programme.title: Leaders Talk
programme.desc: Leaders Talk is China Media Group’s new current affairs program featuring one-on-one interviews with heads of state and high-ranking government officials and heads of international organizations. programme.title: Global Watch
programme.desc: GLOBAL WATCH is a 60 minute-long news program. The show stresses Chinese elements, emphasizing China’s perspective, policies and stories. The program presents to-the-point interpretation of Chinese policies and stories that are of interest to foreign audiences, in a style they are familiar with.

Each episode reveals the enduring impact of these cases on contemporary society and uncovers valuable lessons for the future.

programme.desc: The latest up-to-date news and nationwide weather information.

programme.title: Saturday Watch 9 (B)
programme.desc: A Saturday night show presents the latest news on domestic and foreign affairs with reliable coverage and innovative presentation.

programme.title: Unsolved Cases "File. 04, To the Fugitives: Messages from the Victims’ Families"
programme.desc: NHK Special's iconic series "Unsolved Cases" becomes a standalone program! Through in-depth investigations, the series explores a wide range of cases-from historic incidents that shook society to mysterious local crimes that cast long shadows over communities, both in Japan and abroad. Each episode reveals the enduring impact of these cases on contemporary society and uncovers valuable lessons for the future.

programme.title: News & Weather
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date news and nationwide weather information.

programme.title: Venue101
programme.desc: This live entertainment show delivers the latest music performances and information, and also connects with the audience making full use of social media.

programme.title: Sada Masashi's Midnight Talk Show
programme.desc: A live talk show hosted by Sada Masashi, a veteran singer-songwriter who is also a popular radio personality.

programme.title: Where We Call Home Encore (B)
programme.desc: People from around the globe who put down roots in Japan offer a glimpse into their lives and the hardships they face in Japanese society.

programme.title: Japanese Entertainment Encyclopedia
programme.desc: Discover the magnetism of charismatic Japanese entertainers.

programme.title: World Weather
programme.desc: Weather information of the different areas around the world.

programme.title: Go! Go! Cook R'n
programme.desc: A dietary education program introducing tips for cooking and knowledge of ingredients while enjoying singing and dancing with humorous animation.

programme.title: Drama Serial "The Ghost Writer's Wife" Catch-Up
Koh Kentetsu's Food Travelogue in Japan mini
With Mother (R)
programme.desc: This children's program includes a puppet show, cartoon, music, and gymnastics in which children can participate.

programme.title: no art, no life (R)
programme.desc: Self-taught artists are gaining respect globally. In Japan, such artists are making career-defining works, but few art fans or curators know them.

programme.title: Drama Serial "The Ghost Writer's Wife" Week 5 (R)
programme.desc: The 113th Drama Serial, inspired by the lives of Koizumi Setsu and Lafcadio Hearn also known as Koizumi Yakumo, portrays those who were left behind in the rapidly Westernizing Meiji era. At its heart is a woman captivated by ghost stories and her foreign-born husband. Together, they share a life that seems ordinary yet delightfully odd.

programme.title: NHK Special "Gateway to Abuse: Protect Children from the Digital Society" (R)
programme.desc: A documentary based on timely subjects famous for its dignity and in-depth reporting.

programme.title: World Weather
programme.desc: Weather information of the different areas around the world.

programme.title: MIX Bijutune! (R)
programme.desc: Artist Inoue Ryo presents stories inspired by world art masterpieces through his unique songs and animations.

programme.title: Project X: The Challengers-New Beginnings "Face Recognition" (R)
programme.desc: Project X returns for the first time in 18 years. The former series featured people involved in project related to the Japanese industry and contemporary history. The new series focuses on people in the "Lost Era" following the collapse of the bubble economy. In every era, there are always those take on challenges. Even without receiving praise or being in the spotlight, some dedicate themselves to their work. The documentary delivers passion and courage right to you.

programme.title: World Weather
programme.desc: Weather information of the different areas around the world.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date news from Tokyo.

programme.title: Samurai Drama Selections "Kumokiri Nizaemon Final" Eps. 3
programme.desc: Kumokiri Nizaemon, a thief-of-all-time and the leader of a gang of thieves. Without resorting to violence and leaving no trace behind, he brilliantly steals enormous sum of money from the wealthy. In this final chapter of the series, Nizaemon sets his sights on the hidden vault of Edo’s most powerful moneylender-and the legendary sword "Juzumaru Tsunetsugu".

programme.title: Weather
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date weather information.

programme.desc: Fresh news and information to start off the morning. Specialized reporters and anchors will wake up the viewers with this live news program.

programme.desc: Enjoy the Japanese natural beauties and the many creatures which habitat there and discover the irreplaceable importance of nature.

programme.title: Gentle Journeys
programme.desc: A journey to the different places around Japan.

programme.title: Dear Japan
programme.desc: Amid the issues that regional communities face, local people are rethinking about traditional values and exploring new ways to live together beyond generations. This is a travel documentary visiting affectionate lives of this country.

programme.title: Design Ah! neo
programme.desc: Children can learn the enjoyment of designing and the process of envisioning designs.

programme.title: Ideas to Protect Ourselves from Disasters
programme.desc: Introduce selected news and other information programs related to disasters and reconstructions with experts' comments. The program also focuses on ongoing projects to protect communities from disasters.

programme.desc: A variety program exploring the mysterious world of fish with the fish expert Sakana-kun.

programme.title: Songs for Everyone
programme.desc: A song program where children can sing along by reading the lyrics on the screen.

programme.title: Premium Drama "End-of-life Planning Shared House" Eps. 1（New） (R)
programme.desc: In a shared house on the outskirts of Tokyo, three lifelong friends live together, led by culinary expert Utako (Takeshita Keiko). One day, university student Hayami Shota (Jo Kairi) is invited to be Utako's secretary, sparking a lively exchange between generations. Later, their old friend Tsuneko (Ichige Yoshie), who shows signs of Mild Cognitive Impairment, joins them, throwing things into a bit of chaos. They also begin to confront the real-life challenges of senior living.

programme.desc: Let’s look into the world of Ukiyoe to learn how people lived in Edo period!

programme.desc: Each week, a particular sweet and its recipe will be introduced along with various topics about the sweet.

programme.title: Exploring Factories (R)
programme.desc: An entertainment program visiting small and large factories to discover the latest science, hidden artisanship, and enthusiastic people that support traditions of Japanese manufacture.

programme.title: With Father
programme.desc: A children's program comprised of fun stories, songs as well as gymnastic exercises which can be enjoyed together with fathers.

programme.title: The Visualization Entertainment: Go! Kaneo-kun
programme.desc: The show is MC-ed by comedian Ariyoshi Hiroiki, who hosts an NHK program on a regular basis for the first time. The mascot character "Kaneo-kun" (voice of Nobu, of comedy duo Chidori), who loves money, visits various places, including popular visiting locations, and looks into different phenomena to learn how money plays a role. The undertaking help unravel unexpected trends in society. The program, which can be enjoyed by every member of the family, offers much food for thought.

programme.title: Nosy's Inspiring Atelier
programme.desc: Curious fairies "Nosy" create unique works using their imaginations, inspired by interesting phenomena and materials they found in the world of humans. Let’s express your idea through creation with Nosy, as you think and explore.

programme.title: Darwin's Amazing Animals "Creatures Living in Fukuoka"
programme.desc: Rarely seen. Up-close with some of the planet's most amazing animals. Enter a world of unique creatures from Asia, Africa and the Americas.

programme.title: Historical Drama "UNBOUND" Eps. 42
programme.desc: Tsutaju manages to recover his business with Utamaro’s upper-body portrait series "Fujin Sogaku Juttai." As the new year begins, he rebuilds his shop after losing half his fortune. Furthermore, Utamaro’s latest nishikie, portraying Edo’s poster girls, becomes a huge hit, breathing new life into the town and drawing crowds to the shops. Amidst this renewed bustle, Tei tells Tsutaju she’s pregnant.

programme.title: Frontrunners
programme.desc: As atomic bomb survivors in Hiroshima age, preserving their memories has become a pressing issue - we follow Sumioka Kenta's efforts to further the cause of peace through the creativity of youth.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Ama Divers Restoring the Seabed
programme.desc: Natural disasters devastated the fishing grounds of the ama (free divers) in Wajima in Noto Prefecture in 2024 - we follow their efforts to survey the seabed and revive their tradition.

programme.title: Newsroom Tokyo
programme.desc: This programme gives you comprehensive coverage of events in Japan and Asia, explaining the day's developments and what is behind them.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Yasuda Junichi directed 'A Samurai in Time', a playful film made on a shoestring budget that became a word-of-mouth hit - Yasuda, who is also a rice farmer, gives us the behind-the-scenes story.

programme.title: Impacts: Climates Change the World
programme.desc: Global warming is impacting ecosystems and bird habitats in the World's mountainous regions. In the Japanese Alps, various efforts are underway to protect the endangered Japanese rock ptarmigan.

programme.title: Ukiyo-e Edo-Life
programme.desc: The top three geisha idol celebrities in Edo are Tomimoto Toyohina, Takashima Ohisa, and Naniwaya Kita; see how Kitagawa Utamaro, the master of female beauty, has illustrated them so differently.

programme.title: Medical Frontiers
programme.desc: Nuclear medicine therapy involves delivering radiation-emitting drugs directly inside the body to treat refractory cancers - we explore the mechanism of the therapy and the latest developments.

programme.title: Rethinking Human Security/Africa
programme.desc: A focus on the panel discussion at TICAD 9 held in Yokohama, titled 'Human Security and Economic Development in Africa: Addressing Multidimensional Challenges and the Future Beyond 2030'.

programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Asia Insight
programme.desc: In Yiwu in China, the Muslim Hui people expand trade with Arab countries using their Arabic language skills; they are becoming an essential presence as China shifts away from US trade and diversifies.

programme.title: Chatroom Japan
programme.desc: German urbanist Chris Dimmer focuses on the community-building potential of Japan's public bathhouses (sento) - he hopes that people living alone can rediscover the value of these bathhouses.

programme.title: Japan's Top Inventions
programme.desc: Discover the stories behind renowned Japanese products alongside our reporter - this time, smokeless grills.

programme.desc: French journalist and 'sento ambassador' Stephanie Crohin promotes sento, or public bathhouses, on social media - she tells Peter Barakan about her love for the heartwarming world of public baths.

programme.desc: Visit Kinpusen-ji - sacred for mountain ascetics - the Asuka ruins nominated for a UNESCO listing, Ise Grand Shrine and a pearl divers' village on Kintetsu Railway in Nara and Mie Prefectures.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini
programme.desc: There are about 900 service areas along Japan's expressways - some feature aquariums, amusement parks, or hot spring baths as they continue to evolve and fulfil a growing variety of functions.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: tiny desk concerts Japan
programme.desc: ROTH BART BARON, the globally acclaimed folk rock band helmed by Mifune Masaya, is based in Tokyo and Berlin and renowned for their distinct sound - the group brings a one-of-a-kind performance here.

programme.title: Bosai: Science That Can Save Your Life
programme.desc: Disaster Response Robots: If disaster strikes, it can be hard to find people if fire, volcanic eruption, or nuclear accidents prevent smooth recovery - that's where disaster response robots can help.

programme.title: History of a Traditional Fabric
programme.desc: Yamanashi / Shibata Fumie (Product Designer): Kaiki is a thin and brightly coloured silk fabric - Fumie discovers how threads are arranged to produce a layered effect that resembles a digital image.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Samurai Wisdom
programme.desc: Tsunayoshi, the fifth Tokugawa Shogun, is painted as a foolish ruler in works of fiction... but is this depiction justified? Even he has wisdom to share!

programme.title: Magical Japanese
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture. This episode looks at words related to shadow or shade. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: Matsuri: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: In September, 11 districts in Yatsuo in Toyama Prefecture parade along different routes performing Etchu Owara-Kaze-no-Bon, a 300-year-old matsuri that features elegant music, dancing, and singing.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: The North Korean Abductions
programme.desc: Part 1: North Korean agents abducted at least 17 Japanese citizens in the late 1970s - only 5 returned. We interview over 100 former investigators and others to reveal why the case remains unresolved.

programme.desc: Chinese-American SWAT team captain Wei Xiao Chen destroys the base of a human trafficking syndicate, and discovers the body of a woman who turns out to be her twin sister. She is devastated and vows to track down the truth behind the murder.

programme.desc: Wong Kam Tou, chairman of the Ming Long Group, and cardiac surgeon Tung Yat Yin just got married. Kam Tou dies unexpectedly, triggering a fierce power struggle where Yat Yin uncovers hidden rivalries and vested interests.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2675
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.desc: Lin Yu Ru, the daughter of a cloth merchant who's suffered childhood hardships and she is married to Gu Jiu Si who is the notorious son of Yangzhou's wealthiest family, infamous for his indolent ways. They grow closer despite their differences.

programme.title: Always Home - EP 4
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] This youth campus drama tells the story of a group of children who grew up together in a doctors' residential apartment. They go through all the important milestones in life together, always supporting one another as they study, work, and pursue their dreams.

programme.title: Always Home - EP 5
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] This youth campus drama tells the story of a group of children who grew up together in a doctors' residential apartment. They go through all the important milestones in life together, always supporting one another as they study, work, and pursue their dreams.

programme.title: Family By Choice - EP 14
programme.desc: Three unrelated individuals - Jin Sanha (Hwang In Yeop), Yoon Joowan (Jung Chae Yeon), and Kang Haijoon (Bae Hyun Sung) - become family for each other due to changes in their respective families. Ten years later, the trio reunite, kicking off a youthful romance.

programme.title: Bad and Crazy - EP 4
programme.desc: The story is about Su Yeol (Lee Dong Wook), a corrupt yet practical detective who manifests a split personality K (Wi Ha Joon) who harbours a sense of justice. Watch how he tries to solve various crimes!

programme.title: Birth of A Hero - EP 10
programme.desc: To avoid all the strife caused by the gangland power struggles, YUK WAN-LUNG (Edwin Siu) and his elder sister YUK KIU-FUNG (Rachel Kan) lead a quiet life, running an inn. Unexpectedly, WAN-LUNG is determined to take part in the New Hero Contest, seeking to win his ex, NGAI BING-BING (Roxanne Tong), back. After WAN-LUNG exposes a scandal involving the East Wing imperial guards, he is incarcerated by SAU PAK-KWAN (Ben Wong), a commander of the East Wing.

programme.title: The Stamp of Love - EP 19
programme.desc: KIM (HEUNG HOI LAN, ANNE) is a Malaysian. She marries a Hong Kong man, WAN (LAU DAN), in order to improve her family’s living standard. When she arrives in Hong Kong, she is very confused. She accidentally knocks out a stranger, MAN (KWONG WA), in the street. On the wedding day, WAN suddenly dies from a heart attack, so Kim’s dream of staying in Hong Kong is destroyed. _x000D__x000D_ With the help of WAN’s tenant, she finds a job.

programme.title: The Beauty Of War - EP 15
programme.desc: Chung Ka-po (Jeannie Chan), Lam Siu-mei (Hera Chan) and Lee Ching-yee (Moon Lau) are sisterly buddies. Due to different reasons after graduation, the trio gradually go their separate ways. Ka-po is arbitrarily nominated by Siu-mei to participate in a school beauty contest organized by some magazine. Ka-po is eventually the unchallenged winner, and the Golden Agent Wing Yat-yin (Joel Chan) then convinces her to join his agency. Yat-yin encourages Ka-po to sign up for the Miss Hong Kong Pageant.

programme.title: Fist Within Four Walls, A - EP 4
programme.desc: CHOR AU-KUEN (Ruco Chan) bears the grief of the loss of his family and returns to the walled city in hopes of finding his long lost sister, only to find out that the place he grew up in has become a lawless no man's land. Concealing his real identity as a Bajiquan master, he creates a new identity and gets acquainted with a feisty hair salon lady boss, TIU LAN (Nancy Wu), a dentist, DUEN YING-FUNG (Benjamin Yuen), and a worker, BUT TAK-LIU (Lam Tsz Sin).

programme.title: Cold Blood Warm Heart - EP 63
programme.desc: Bong (Adam Cheng) blamed Sing (Kwan Hoi San) for abandoning his mother and refused to acknowledge him as his father even he was one of the richest men in town. He loved and admired his foster father Kin (Bow Fong), who was a retired cop. He and his brother Lap (Gallen Lo) followed Kin’s footsteps and joined the force.

programme.title: Cold Blood Warm Heart - EP 64
programme.desc: Bong (Adam Cheng) blamed Sing (Kwan Hoi San) for abandoning his mother and refused to acknowledge him as his father even he was one of the richest men in town. He loved and admired his foster father Kin (Bow Fong), who was a retired cop. He and his brother Lap (Gallen Lo) followed Kin’s footsteps and joined the force.

He loved and admired his foster father Kin (Bow Fong), who was a retired cop. He and his brother Lap (Gallen Lo) followed Kin’s footsteps and joined the force.

programme.title: Class of Distinction - EP 2
programme.desc: Po (Leon Lai) worked in an advertising company, but his work was not appreciated. He was upset and quitted his job. He took Yi’s (Jessica Hester Hsuan) suggestion and become a teacher. There he met Sam (Theresa Lee), the school’s social worker. She inspired Po and he decided to become a good teacher. His effort and dedication gradually earned him support and respect from the students and his fellow colleagues.

programme.title: My Sister of Eternal Flower - EP 15
programme.desc: FA LAI-CHU (Charmaine Sheh) is a kindhearted and innocent woman with the IQ of a ten-year-old. When her parents passed away, she shouldered the responsibility for the care of her younger sister and brother.

programme.title: Forensic Heroes IV - EP 29
programme.desc: Senior Chemist of Forensic Science Division Ko On (Raymond Wong), Senior Forensic Pathologist Man Ka-hei (Selena Lee) and Kowloon West Regional Crime Unit Senior Inspector Kwok Fai-wong (Shaun Tam) are the pillars of Crime Busting Trio leading a team of outstanding individuals. They unravel appalling schemes by using advanced forensic science. Their mastery of pathology enables them to decode secrets of the human anatomy.

programme.title: Forensic Heroes IV - EP 30
programme.desc: Senior Chemist of Forensic Science Division Ko On (Raymond Wong), Senior Forensic Pathologist Man Ka-hei (Selena Lee) and Kowloon West Regional Crime Unit Senior Inspector Kwok Fai-wong (Shaun Tam) are the pillars of Crime Busting Trio leading a team of outstanding individuals. They unravel appalling schemes by using advanced forensic science. Their mastery of pathology enables them to decode secrets of the human anatomy.

programme.title: Learning Curve Of A Warlord, The - EP 19
programme.desc: In the Warlord Era, DIK KEI (Dicky Cheung) is a lowly captain without any ambition. He has been using his crafty ideas and fast-talking to survive the past twenty years. Due to successfully saving Marshal MUNG TAI-TUNG (Tsoi Kwok Hing), he is successively promoted seven grades and becomes a bully calling the shots in Sing Wai Town.

programme.title: Learning Curve Of A Warlord, The - EP 20
programme.desc: In the Warlord Era, DIK KEI (Dicky Cheung) is a lowly captain without any ambition. He has been using his crafty ideas and fast-talking to survive the past twenty years.
